query: My refund is still not processed after 10 days!
response: We apologize for the delay. Refunds typically process within 5–7 business days. Let me check your status now.

query: How can I reset my password?
response: Click on 'Forgot Password' on the login screen and follow the instructions in your email.

query: Thanks for the quick help yesterday!
response: You're very welcome! We're always here if you need anything else.

query: The app crashes when I try to open it.
response: We’re really sorry about the crash. Please try reinstalling or updating the app. We’re working on a fix.

query: Where can I find my order history?
response: Your order history is available in your profile under the 'Orders' section.

query: The product I received is defective.
response: We’re sorry to hear that. Please upload a photo of the defect and we’ll send a replacement or issue a refund.

query: When will the out-of-stock item be available again?
response: We expect restocks in 1–2 weeks. You can sign up for notifications on the product page.

query: I was double charged on my credit card!
response: We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. We’ve initiated a refund for the duplicate charge.

query: How do I cancel my subscription?
response: You can cancel your subscription anytime from the 'Billing' section in your account settings.

query: I’m very happy with the service!
response: Thank you so much! We appreciate your kind words and are always here to help.

query: Why hasn’t my package shipped yet?
response: We’re looking into the delay. Your order should ship within 2 business days. Thanks for your patience!

query: Can I change my shipping address?
response: Sure! If your order hasn’t shipped yet, we can update the address. Please provide the new one.

query: How long do returns take to process?
response: Returns are processed within 3–5 business days of receiving your package.

query: I’ve sent three messages and no reply!
response: We’re really sorry for the delay in our response. We’re here now and will prioritize your issue immediately.

query: Just wanted to say the onboarding experience was great.
response: That’s wonderful to hear! Thanks for taking the time to let us know.

query: Is there a way to track my refund status?
response: Yes! Go to your account dashboard and click on ‘Refunds’ to see the status of your request.

query: Your service sucks.
response: We’re really sorry you feel this way. Let’s work together to fix the problem you’re facing.

query: How do I activate two-factor authentication?
response: You can activate 2FA from your account settings under the 'Security' tab.

query: My refund was faster than expected!
response: Awesome! We try to process them as quickly as possible. Glad it helped!

query: I want to update my email address.
response: You can update your email from your account profile. Just click ‘Edit Profile’ and save changes.

query: This is the THIRD time I’ve contacted support. Why am I being ignored?
response: We sincerely apologize for the repeated inconvenience. Your issue is now our top priority and we’ll make this right immediately.

query: I PAID for 2-day shipping. It’s been a week!
response: We completely understand your frustration. Our team is investigating the delay and will ensure your shipping fees are refunded if applicable.

query: You charged me twice and now I’m overdrawn. Fix this NOW.
response: We’re very sorry to hear that. A refund for the duplicate charge is being processed immediately, and we’ve escalated this for faster resolution.

query: I’m really disappointed. The item looked NOTHING like the pictures.
response: Sorry about that! We’d be happy to issue a return or replacement, and we’ll share your feedback with our product team.

query: No one answers your phone line. What kind of support is this?
response: We apologize for the difficulty reaching us. We’re currently handling high volume but can assist you right here. What can we help with?

query: This is actually the best support experience I’ve ever had.
response: That means a lot to us — thank you! We’re here whenever you need help.

query: The instructions you sent make no sense. I’m not a tech expert.
response: Thanks for the feedback. Let me simplify the steps for you — I’ll walk you through it personally.

query: You sent me someone else’s order. Unacceptable.
response: We're extremely sorry for the mix-up. We’re sending a return label and shipping your correct item immediately.

query: I can’t log in even after resetting my password.
response: Let’s get this sorted — could you confirm the email address you used? We’ll investigate the login issue from our end.

query: Why are your support hours so short? People work late!
response: We appreciate the feedback. We’re working toward extended hours and will share your suggestion with our operations team.

query: Thanks for sorting this out so quickly!
response: Glad to hear that! We’re always here if anything else comes up.

query: When will I get a tracking number?
response: Your tracking number is sent via email as soon as the order ships. If you haven’t received it, I can retrieve it for you now.

query: I’m moving — can I update the shipping address?
response: Yes! If your order hasn’t shipped yet, just provide the new address and we’ll update it immediately.

query: Do you offer live chat?
response: We do! Just click the chat icon on our support page during working hours, and one of our agents will be with you shortly.

query: Why did you cancel my order without telling me?
response: We apologize for the lack of communication. Some orders are canceled automatically due to inventory or payment issues. Let me investigate yours now.

query: Do I need the original packaging for a return?
response: No, you don’t need the original packaging — just make sure the item is protected for transit. Let us know if you need a return label.

query: Your support rep was incredibly rude to me.
response: We’re truly sorry about your experience. That’s not the standard we hold. We’ll escalate this and follow up with proper resolution.

query: Can I schedule a callback?
response: Absolutely — just share your preferred time and number, and we’ll have someone call you back within the hour.

query: How do I update my payment method?
response: You can update your payment method from the Billing tab under your account settings. Let me know if you need a step-by-step!

query: My promo code didn’t apply at checkout.
response: Sorry about that! Please send the code and we’ll apply the discount manually to your order.

query: I need help urgently. This is a business-critical order.
response: Understood. We’ve flagged your order for priority support and will work to resolve this immediately.

query: Your chatbot just loops me around. This is stupid.
response: We’re sorry for the poor experience. I’m a human agent, and I’ll assist you directly now — let’s get this fixed.

query: What’s the return deadline?
response: Returns are accepted within 30 days of delivery. If you’re close to the deadline, let us know and we can assist further.

query: I'm locked out and I need access ASAP.
response: We're on it. Please confirm your identity via email and we’ll restore access right away.

query: Thank you! This was actually a pleasant experience.
response: That’s awesome to hear — we’re glad we could help!

query: I asked a simple question and got a useless response.
response: I’m really sorry that happened. Let’s get your question answered correctly this time. What exactly were you asking?

query: Is it safe to save my card info on your site?
response: Yes — we use PCI-compliant, encrypted payment systems to ensure your data is safe and never stored on our servers.

query: What if I miss my delivery?
response: Carriers usually attempt redelivery or leave a pickup slip. Let us know if you miss it and we’ll help coordinate.

query: My package was marked as delivered but it’s not here!
response: Please check nearby entrances or with neighbors. If it’s still missing after 24 hours, we’ll start a lost package investigation.

query: Do you ship internationally?
response: Yes! We currently ship to 40+ countries. You can check delivery times and costs at checkout.
